trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en aktivitet kvalifisert plassering som svarer til en bruker hendelse i potensielle kjøring av banen til en arbeidsflytforekomst som roten.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En Aktivitetsdesigner eller designer arbeidsflyt kan bruke noen av de overbelastet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoder for å utstyre arbeidsflyten for å sende data til kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur som en bruker-hendelse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Dataene slippes ut refereres til som brukerdata.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til aktiviteten Statushendelser og arbeidsflyten Statushendelser, som bare forekommer på aktiviteten eller arbeidsflyt status endres, kan det forekomme brukerhandlinger på hvor som helst som brukes i en arbeidsflyt.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: En UserTrackingLocation definerer samsvarende parameterne for denne plasseringen ved å angi hvilken type brukerdata typen til aktiviteten som den må være slippes ut, en samling av betingelser som kan tekstskriften kvalifisere forekomstene av denne aktiviteten må en valgfri nøkkelnavn som brukerdataene må knyttes, om avledede typer brukerdataene som skal sammenlignes , og om brukerdata fra aktiviteter utledet fra typen for den angitte aktiviteten som skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single UserTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En enkelt UserTrackingLocation kan referere til mer enn én faktiske plasseringen i potensielle kjøring av banen til en arbeidsflytforekomst.

trans-unit.source: You may add a UserTrackingLocation to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til en UserTrackingLocation enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for å definere samsvarer parametere for en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the UserTrackingLocation to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det er tre generelle betingelser som må oppfylles i denne rekkefølgen for UserTrackingLocation til å samsvare med kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur: aktivitet som har slippes ut en hendelse for brukeren må samsvare med settet med aktiviteter angitt av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, og <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; nøkkelen, hvis den finnes, som er forbundet med brukeren må samsvare med <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; og, av brukerdata slippes ut av hendelsen brukeren må samsvare med antall brukerdatatyper som er angitt av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the UserTrackingLocation matched.
trans-unit.target: Bare hvis alle tre av disse betingelsene oppfylles, anser runtime sporing infrastruktur UserTrackingLocation samsvar.

trans-unit.source: To configure a UserTrackingLocation, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil konfigurere en UserTrackingLocation, må du angi enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>til å angi typen brukerdata til samsvare og enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>til å angi hvilken type aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut til å samsvare.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>objekter til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>til å kvalifisere mer fullstendig aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>til å angi at brukerdata avledet fra brukerdatatypen som er angitt av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>som skal sammenlignes, og du kan angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>til å angi at brukerdata fra aktiviteter utledet fra aktivitetstypen angitt av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>som skal sammenlignes.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this UserTrackingLocation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>data som er forbundet med nytt navn til å angi at brukeren skal sammenlignes for denne UserTrackingLocation.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>er en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), prøver ikke kjøretiden sporing struktur som samsvarer med nøkkelen som er forbundet med brukerdataene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer et tomt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi både av brukerdata som samsvarer med og typen aktivitet som den må være slippes ut for å samsvare.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Derfor til å konfigurere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>må du eksplisitt angi enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>til å angi typen for en aktivitet som brukerdata må slippes ut hvis du vil samsvare, og du må også eksplisitt angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>til å angi hvilken av brukerdata til samsvarer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere ytterligere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen ved å bruke ukvalifiserte navn av common language runtime (CLR) brukerdataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med dataene for brukeren av den angitte typen fra arbeidsflyten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdata til samsvare `argumentTypeName`.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt angi enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>i koden til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i brukerdata til samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klasse bruke common language runtime (CLR) type brukerdataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med dataene for brukeren av den angitte typen fra arbeidsflyten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt angi enten <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>i koden til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdata til samsvarer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av ukvalifiserte navnet på common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdataene og ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med alle brukerdata av angitt type fra aktiviteter for den angitte typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av aktiviteten og brukerdataene.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktiviteten er "Kode".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i brukerdata til samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av ukvalifiserte navnet på common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdataene og CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med alle brukerdata av angitt type fra aktiviteter for den angitte typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdataene.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i brukerdata til samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdata og ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med alle brukerdata av angitt type fra aktiviteter for den angitte typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>til aktiviteten.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktiviteten er "Kode".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdata til samsvarer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navn på CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdataene og CLR-typen i aktiviteten som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som samsvarer med alle brukerdata av angitt type fra aktiviteter for den angitte typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan videre kvalifisere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>ved å angi de andre egenskapene.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdata til samsvarer.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir common language runtime (CLR) typen aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut til å spores.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi hvilken type aktiviteten på en måte uavhengig av versjon, kan du bruke <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ActivityType eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>på aktivitet som dataene må være slippes ut.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ukvalifiserte common language runtime (CLR) typen aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut til å spores.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ukvalifiserte navn av typen for aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set ActivityTypeName to "Code".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å angi det kvalifiserte navnet på en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktivitet, angi ActivityTypeName til "Kode".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName kan mye enklere å angi hvilken type aktivitet som avgir brukerdataene når du redigerer en profil direkte i XML.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName også kan versjon uavhengig av refererer til type aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ActivityTypeName eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>på aktivitet som dataene må være slippes ut.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdata spores.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi bruker-datatypen i en uavhengig av versjon måte, kan du bruke <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ArgumentType eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>brukerdata spores.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ukvalifiserte common language runtime (CLR) typen brukerdata spores.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName kan mye enklere å angi hvilken type brukerdataene når du redigerer en profil direkte i XML.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName også kan versjon uavhengig av refererer til bruker-datatypen.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi ArgumentTypeName eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>til å konfigurere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Ukvalifiserte navnet på den <xref:System.Type>av brukerdataene.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av betingelser som brukes til å kvalifisere aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut til å spores.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke betingelser for å definere forekomst av aktivitetstypen som er angitt av tekstskriften <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>fra som hendelsen brukeren må være slippes ut til å matche sporing plasseringen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil samsvare med bare for eksempel <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktiviteter med en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>lik "MyCode", kan du angi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>til "Kode" og legge til en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>forhold som angir at egenskapen ID for forekomsten av aktiviteten må være lik "MyCode".</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>i betingelser må være true for aktivitet for å samsvare.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> som brukes til å kvalifisere aktivitet som brukerdataene må være slippes ut.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir navnet som brukerdataene må knyttes til det <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: En Aktivitetsdesigner eller designer arbeidsflyt kan bruke begge <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>å knytte en strengnøkkel til brukerdata er slippes ut i en hendelse for brukeren.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of KeyName for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Nøkkelnavn ikke er en nullreferanse (`Nothing`), nøkkelen tilknyttet brukerdataene må samsvare med verdien for Nøkkelnavn for den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>samsvarer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Nøkkelnavn er en nullreferanse (`Nothing`), kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur ikke se etter en samsvarende for å fastslå om det <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>samsvarer.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> nøkkelen som må brukerdataene være tilknyttet til den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> til å samsvare eller et nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukerdataene skal spores når den er slippes ut fra aktiviteter utledet fra aktivitetstypen angitt av <> </> *> eller <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukerdataene skal spores når den sender aktiviteter utledet fra typen som er angitt av <> </> *> eller <> </> *>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren sporing plassering er mulig å filtrere spores brukerdata.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan filtrere etter hva slags spores brukerdataene ved å angi den <> </> *> eller <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> verdi til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> angir at spores brukerdataene kan være av typen ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName eller en type som er avledet fra ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*> should be tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukerdata utledet fra typen brukerdata som er angitt av <> </> *> eller <> </> *> skal sporede; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
